articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Token Trees NFT
What are #TokenTrees NFTs you ask? A 🧵
Our Python Dapp scans all the erc721 tokens in your Eth wallet. We use @infura_io to get a bunch of data including all the TokenIds, NFT contract addresses and fromAddresses. Then the Turtle algorithms go into beaver mode. 1/n
